Reviews.Title: Looking for a good DSLR? Look no further!
Reviews.Author: Bill Sydnes
Reviews.Content: Well you’ve gotten this far, now look to your top right press add to cart and click proceed to checkout! I’ve spent the better part of two months reading reviews, product reviews, and articles, about this camera, and my conclusion is this is a great buy. I’ve had great luck buying refurbished products, and generally speaking you save 30-50% over new retail. However these refurbished models go through three or four times the testing than do New ones. You can’t tell that this is refurbished at all. The two lenses that come in this kit are also refurbished but I’ve snapped well over 1000 pics in four days, all in all of the auto modes, effects and scenes, and quite frankly I’m impressed. Making the switch from point and shoot to DSLR seems very complicated but with YouTube videos and books you will never look back at making the switch. You WILL NEED A TRI-POD! Also buy a GOOD NIKON camera bag as well, PROTECT your investment! Don’t buy a cheap one. The tripod makes taking macro close ups of insects, bees, and butterfly’s come out like a pro even on Auto settings! You and your friends will be amazed at the clarity of your photographic compositions! In conclusion, if you have a son or daughter, or even for yourself who is taking Intro to Photography in College this is a camera they can grow into before moving two steps up from this one to a professional Nikon camera yet still retain Professional results.

Reviews.Title: GOOD PRODUCT
Reviews.Author: RAUL BARANANO
Reviews.Content: I RECEIVED ALL THE PRODUCT I BUY IN PERFECT CONDITIONS.I AM VERY HAPPY , BECAUSE I NEED FOR WORKING ON MY AUDIOVISUAL INGENIERY COURSE
